name: ListNetwork
description: Retrieve a list of Network resources.

IsoCountry.description: The [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the Network resources to read.

Mcc.description: The 'mobile country code' of a country. Network resources with this `mcc` in their `identifiers` will be read.

Mnc.description: The 'mobile network code' of a mobile operator network. Network resources with this `mnc` in their `identifiers` will be read.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
